text:
CONTRACT - Banking Sector - London

I am looking for a Javascript Developer to join a small team of 4 in the banking industry. The framework of choice is Backbone.js although it is not a required skill if you are a strong Javascript candidate you'll pick it up quickly!

I am leaving the team to work on my own startup which I am gutted about as the team is brilliant.

The day rate is very competitive, email me directly and I can tell you more about it! josh@seriousfox.co.uk
